lines.text: Humiliatin', that's what it is. Under a bed and no husband in sight!
lines.character: Joe McGoo - the Favorite 'Schnozzle' of the Screen

lines.text:
[to Baron Munchausen]
We were looking for fruits and nuts.
lines.character: Joe McGoo - the Favorite 'Schnozzle' of the Screen
The Famous Baron Munchausen of the Air

lines.text:
[the water's off in the shower]
The girls are standing around with no clothes on.

[the 3 Stooges march in with pitchers of water]
Who ordered the ice water?

lines.character: Joe McGoo - the Favorite 'Schnozzle' of the Screen
The Famous Baron Munchausen of the Air

lines.text: What a question, did you have dinner tonight? You ate 12 courses, not counting the cutlery!
lines.character: Joe McGoo - the Favorite 'Schnozzle' of the Screen
